header.#text: Referral of case to lead agency

text.#text: A potential suspension or debarment case described in this subparagraph is a case involving a person that is an Afghan national or foreign national or foreign company operating in Afghanistan that has received in the past, is receiving, or may receive in the future, funds from any—
covered prime contract; or
covered subcontract.
